title: Obama gives Kanye West some advice for his presidential campaign, Kanye gives Obama some shoes
text:
Obama gives Kanye West some advice for his presidential campaign, Kanye gives Obama some shoes Obama gives Kanye West some advice for his presidential campaign, Kanye gives Obama some shoes 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Kanye West recently made the most audacious claim of a career defined by audacity when he said he wanted to run for President. 
It turns out Yeezy’s designs on the oval office did not go unnoticed by POTUS himself. 
President Obama offered some pointed advice to the controversial rapper during a Democratic National Committee fundraiser in San Francisco. 
Check out this footage from CBS News of the President’s speech. 
“In case Kanye is serious about this whole POTUS thing, or as he calls it, Peezy, I do have advice for him,” the President joked. 
“First of all, you’ve got to spend a lot of time dealing with some strange characters who behave like they’re on a reality TV show, so you’ve gotta be cool with that. 
“Second, saying you have a Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy, that’s what’s known as off-message in politics, you can’t say something like that – a lot of people have lost their congressional seats saying something like that. 
The former Illinois state senator added: “And number three, do you really think this country’s gonna elect a black guy from the south side of Chicago with a funny to be President of the United States – that is crazy!” 
But Kanye, not wanting to let the President’s sage advice go unrecognised, decided he would try and return the generosity. 
En route to Obama – two pairs Yeezy trainers. Share article 
If we see POTUS wearing these, we predict the internet will be broken again. Promoted Stories
